intro: This button allows you to manage User Groups in your platform.
This button provides access to the Users management page.
Use this button to view the Video Chart statistics.
This button opens the Advertising Manager for managing ads on your platform.
Click here to encode video and audio using the encoding service.
This button lets you upload files directly without encoding, including formats like pdf, images, zip, mp4, and mp3.
Use this button to embed a video link from external sources.
Click here to add a new article to your platform.
This button allows you to sort your videos for better organization.
This button allows you to select or deselect all videos in the grid manager.
Here you can change the status of the selected videos to Active, Inactive, Unlisted, or Unpublished.
This option allows you to add the selected videos to a specific user group for controlled access.
This option allows you to remove the selected videos from a specific user group.
Use this button to swap the video file for another one while keeping the current video metadata.
Click here to update the disk usage for all videos, providing updated storage statistics.
This button allows you to delete the selected videos from the system.
Use this dropdown to filter videos by categories. You can search and select the category you want to filter.
Filter videos by status such as Active, Inactive, Encoding, and more.
Use this dropdown to filter videos by type. You can choose between video, embed, image, article, or series.
Customize your search fields here. You can select which fields to search for when you are filtering videos.
Enable or disable compact mode to adjust the display of the video list.
